result.title: Report on the benchmarking study: developed demonstrator with connections of sheet metal parts for electrical applications compared to the state-of-the-art products
result.description: D6.7 documents the performance of the demonstrator with connections of tubular parts for electrical applications. This concerns especially the results of specific tests usually performed in production. This performance is compared to the performance of the state of the art solution in order to clearly document advantages and disadvantages of the innovation.
